title: Sketchbook, "Sketchbook with designs for Semiramis Hotel and other objects"
medium: Ring-bound sketchbook with black cover and 15 leaves, rollerball pen in black ink on white paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black, on first page: "Bombay 2-2000"
description: Spiral bound with shiny black covers and 15 leaves, contains sketches pertaining to carpet for Directional USA (2000-50-34-3/4)  desk top objects (2000-50-34-7); building rooves and facades (2000-50-34-10/15).  See entries for key individual pages.

tombstone.epitaph: Sketchbook, "Sketchbook with designs for Semiramis Hotel and other objects". Ring-bound sketchbook with black cover and 15 leaves, rollerball pen in black ink on white paper. Gift of Karim Rashid. 2000-50-34-1/15.
